Generates vegetation polygon, line and point layers for a Sequoia project.

seq_vege.Rd

This function is a convenience wrapper around get_vege_poly(), get_vege_line() and get_vege_point(), allowing the user to download all products in one call and automatically write them to the project directory using seq_write().

Usage

seq_vege(dirname = ".", verbose = TRUE, overwrite = FALSE)

Arguments

dirname

character Path to the directory. Defaults to the current working directory.

verbose

logical If TRUE, display messages.

overwrite

logical If TRUE, file is overwritten.

Value

A named list of file paths written by seq_write(), one per vegetation layer.

Details

Each vegetation layer is always written to disk using seq_write(), even when it contains no features (nrow == 0).

Informational messages are displayed to indicate whether a layer contains features or is empty.

See also

get_vege_poly(), get_vege_line(), get_vege_point(), seq_write()
